Description: This template is for otp send to user
SMS: Welcome to [[ProviderName]] , Your One Time Passcode is [[OTPNumber]]. To opt out, please reply STOP.

Appointment created for you with [[ProviderName]] for [[Date]] [[Time]] at [[ProviderAddress]]. Call [[ProviderPhone]] with questions  or visit the patient portal from the link below: [[NewLineCharacter]][[NewLineCharacter]] [[PatientUrl]]

Appointment changed for you with [[ProviderName]] to [[Date]] [[Time]] at [[ProviderAddress]]. Call [[ProviderPhone]] with questions or visit the patient portal from the link below:[[NewLineCharacter]][[NewLineCharacter]][[PatientUrl]]

Appointment cancelled for you with [[ProviderName]] for [[Date]] [[Time]] at [[ProviderAddress]]. Call [[ProviderPhone]] with questions or visit the patient portal from the link below:[[NewLineCharacter]][[NewLineCharacter]][[PatientUrl]]

24 hour appointment reminder: [[ProviderName]] for [[Date]] [[Time]] at [[ProviderAddress]]. Call [[ProviderPhone]] with questions or visit the patient portal from the link below:[[NewLineCharacter]][[NewLineCharacter]][[PatientUrl]]
You have been opted in for text message notifications on [[modifiedOn]] for [[providerName]]. Reply STOP to opt-out.
You have been opted out for text message notifications on [[modifiedOn]] for [[providerName]].
24 hour payment scheduled reminder for [[ProviderName]]. $[[TotalAmount]]  will be processed on [[NextScheduleDate]]. Call [[ProviderPhone]] with questions.
Your payment of $[[TotalAmount]] has been processed on [[CreatedOn]] for [[ProviderName]]. Call [[ProviderPhone]] with questions.
Your payment of $[[TotalAmount]] has been scheduled on [[ScheduleDate]] for [[ProviderName]]. Call [[ProviderPhone]] with questions.
A [[PaymentType]] has been created on [[CreatedOn]] for $[[TotalAmount]] with [[NoOfPayments]] payments of $[[PaymentAmount]]. Call [[ProviderPhone]] with questions.
Your refund of $[[TotalAmount]] has been processed on [[CreatedOn]] for [[ProviderName]]. Call [[ProviderPhone]] with questions.
Your transaction of $[[TotalAmount]] has been voided on [[ModifiedOn]] for [[ProviderName]]. Call [[ProviderPhone]] with questions.
Patient account activated for [[providerName]] [[providerPhone]]. Temporary password is: [[password]]. Reply STOP to opt out.
Your password for [[ProviderName]] was updated on [[ModifiedOn]]. If you did not make this change, please call [[ProviderContactNumber]] immediately.
Payment account ending in [[CardNumber]] has been modified on [[ModifiedOn]] by [[ProviderName]]. Call [[ProviderPhone]] with questions.
New payment account ending in [[CardNumber]] has been added to your account on [[CreatedOn]] by [[ProviderName]]. Call [[ProviderPhone]] with questions.
Thank you for using self-service password reset with [[User.ProviderName]]. Your temporary password is: [[User.User.UnHashedPassword]]. Call [[User.ProviderContactNumber]] with questions.
Patient account activated for [[ProviderName]]. Call [[ProviderPhone]] with questions. Reply STOP to opt-out. Opt-in will not be allowed for 30 days.

Description: Cancel Payment Plan by Provider Admin
SMS: [[PaymentType]] [[PaymentPlanId]] with [[ProviderName]] has been cancelled on [[ModifiedOn]].
Your [[PaymentType]] payment of $[[TotalAmount]] has been processed on [[CreatedOn]] for [[ProviderName]]. Call [[ProviderPhone]] with questions.
Your [[PaymentType]] payment of $[[TotalAmount]] has been voided on [[ModifiedOn]] for [[ProviderName]]. Call [[ProviderPhone]] with questions.

TemplateName: UPDATE PAYMENT METHOD IN PAYMENT PLAN
Description: UPDATE PAYMENT METHOD IN PAYMENT PLAN NOTIFICATION
SMS: Your [[PaymentType]] with [[ProviderName]] has been updated with a new payment account ending in [[CardNumber]] on [[ModifiedOn]]. Call [[ProviderPhone]] with questions.
Your [[PaymentType]] schedule with [[ProviderName]] has been modified on [[ModifiedOn]]. Login to patient portal to view changes. Call [[ProviderPhone]] with questions.
Your [[PaymentType]] payment with [[ProviderName]] has been modified on [[ModifiedOn]]. Login to patient portal to view changes. Call [[ProviderPhone]] with questions.
Patient responsibility balance ending with [[last4DigitInvoiceNo]] added on [[modifiedOn]] to $ [[totalAmount]] for [[providerName]].Login to pay.Call [[providerPhone]] with questions.

Description: Appointment Recurring Creation sms to patient
SMS: [[AptTotalCount]] [[Frequency]] appointments created for you with [[ProviderName]] from [[Date]] [[Time]] at [[ProviderAddress]]. Call [[ProviderPhone]] with questions or visit the patient portal from the link below:[[NewLineCharacter]][[NewLineCharacter]][[PatientUrl]]

Description: Appointment recurring Update Sms to patient
SMS: [[AptTotalCount]] [[Frequency]] appointments changed for you with [[ProviderName]] from [[Date]] [[Time]] at [[ProviderAddress]]. Call [[ProviderPhone]] with questions or visit the patient portal from the link below:[[NewLineCharacter]][[NewLineCharacter]][[PatientUrl]]

Description: Appointment Recurring Cancelled Sms to patient
SMS: [[AptTotalCount]] [[Frequency]] appointments cancelled for you with [[ProviderName]] for [[Time]]. Call [[ProviderPhone]] with questions.
Patient responsibility balance ending with [[last4DigitInvoiceNo]] for [[providerName]]  has been paid.Call [[providerPhone]] with questions.
Patient responsibility balance ending with [[last4DigitInvoiceNo]] updated on [[modifiedOn]] to $ [[totalAmount]] for [[providerName]].Call [[providerPhone]] with questions.
Please follow this link to register [[UniqueRegistrationLinkId]]
